articles.title: US jobless aid applications retreat to 231,000 after surging to nearly 4-year high a week earlier - ABC News
articles.description: The number of Americans applying for jobless aid last week retreated significantly after surging to a nearly four-year high a week earlier
articles.content:

articles.author: Paige Smith
articles.title: Amex Boosts Platinum Fee to $895, Adds Resy and Lululemon Perks - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: American Express Co. is boosting the annual fee for its Platinum consumer credit card to $895 — a $200 increase — and adding about $1,500 of potential perks to help customers get over the sticker shock.
articles.content: American Express Co. is boosting the annual fee for its Platinum consumer credit card to $895 a $200 increase and adding about $1,500 of potential perks to help customers get over the sticker shock.… [+223 chars]
